import React from'react';import{ethers}from'ethers';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const requestAccount=async()=>{await window.ethereum.request({method:'eth_requestAccounts'});};const sendTransaction=async()=>{if(typeof window.ethereum!=='undefined'){await requestAccount();const provider=new ethers.BrowserProvider(window.ethereum);const signer=provider.getSigner();console.log(signer);const transaction={to:'0x131CF758d9EF6bcA88928442DC715c8Fdc113952',// Replace with the recipient address
